content: us 8 5mm 16 /40 cm and 24 /60 cm or longer circular needles or one size smaller than gauge needle note for smaller sizes you will also need a 9 circular needle or dpns tools stitch markers tapestry needle gauge 16 sts and 24 rnds to 4 /10cm worked in stockinette st in the round using gauge needle **errata** there seems to be some sort of glitch and some users are unable to update this pattern i m including the errata below on page 4 before begin body work the following next round k all sts increase 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 4 8 8 8 12 20 20 sts evenly around 52 56 60 84 88 92 92 100 104 104 108 112 120 120 sts *this pattern has been professionally tech edited *
